title: Default values are not shown in Show Report Parameters dialog
description: When previewing a report and clicking the Show Report Parameters button, the default values are not shown in the value box. This prevents the user from easily modifying the parameter they want to change. Instead, all values in the Enter Parameters dialog are empty, requiring the user to input all values even if they only want to modify one parameter.
OB: When creating several report parameters and setting default values for them, I dragged them to the layout.
EB: When previewing the report and clicking the Show Report Parameters button, I expected to see the default values shown in the value box. This way, I could easily modify the parameter I want to change without having to input all values again.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create several report parameters. 2. Set default values for the parameters. 3. Drag the parameters to the layout. 4. Preview the report. 5. Click the Show Report Parameters button.
